attributes.action: provide incentives via the tax system for those organsing sporting events for young people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are told that the nation is becoming more obese yet for those that are trying to organise sporting events for young people they are hit at every turn with red tape and rising bills, with in some cases the event priced out of existence. By providing incentives via the tax system to organise such events it may prompt larger events to be organised at a lower cost to the organisers and make smaller events more affordable.
